topic.title: Submissions
topic.section: Once the Proofreader logs in, clicking on the Proofreader link on the User Home page leads to the Submissions queue. This queue which lists those works which they have been asked to do the layout, as well as access to those submissions which they have completed in the past. The Proofreader clicks on the works title which leads to the Proofreader's Proofreading page.
